member.name: M:SuperMuskler4000GIFAPI.Managers.VideoManager.GetByMuscleType(System.String)
member.summary: creates a list with videos where it get the data from the database and sortes them after mucletype, and if mucle type is null or empthy it throw an exception.

member.name: M:SuperMuskler4000GIFAPI.Managers.VideoManager.ReadVideo(Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader)

member.param: Type SqlDataReader. Reads the data from the database
member.returns: Returns an object of the Video class
